1.title: Choices

11.content:
How about one of these swap story ideas?

1. Witch- You have an encounter with a witch, who curses you to swap bodies with somebody.

2. Body Swap Machine- Your family moves into a new house, and in it you discover a machine capable of swapping people's bodies.

3. Cursed Object- You come into contact with a Cursed Object, which swaps your body with somebody else.

4. Swapping Candies- You or somebody you know acquires candies capable of swapping people's bodies.

5. Ghost- A ghost possesses your body and sends you into somebody else's body.
11.title: Choices 1

choices: The witch is someone in your family
The witch is someone from school

Of course you respect that your father had to go here to not lose his job and at the end it ok, but you might need some friends. You feel lonely!

"Hey... I'm sorry."

Youre awestruck, because all of a sudden, youre staring into the deep blue eyes of the most gorgeous girl you've ever seen.

"Hey... I'm Jack," you mumble. She giggles. "I'm Carly."

You don't know why, but all of a sudden, you get a burst of confidence. "Would you wanna get a cup of coffee sometime?"

She smiles. "How about tomorrow?"

"Thats great. Can you meet me here? Let's say at 7?"

She nods. You can't believe your luck.

The next day goes by incredibly slowly, until it's time for your coffee with Carly.

"I thought youd never show up!" She exclaims when you walk to the spot you said you'd meet.

"I'm new to this town, youre gonna have to show me the best coffee place."

Your evening is phenomenal. You get along famously, and actually have a lot in common.

"So..." you finally say. "I really like you. Will you go out with me? "

1113211.content:
"Oh! I'm sorry!" you exclaim as you bump into somebody. You look up. It's a girl you've seen a few times before, but never spoken to. People always whispered about her being "that creepy emo chick", and like you, she seemed friendless.

"Oh, it's alright," she says to you, her dull green eyes, winged with thick eyeliner looking boredly into yours. She appears to be wearing a robe of some kind, or some kind of black drapey article wrapped around her body. She has torn black stockings as well as black boots. Her hair is a black-dyed mess, and it looks as if she's been cutting it herself. She has stretched ears plugged with gauges and several piercings in her ears, lips, nose, and on her eyebrows.

You're about to walk away when she says, "Hey, could you help me with something?" Already a few steps away, you warily say, "What?" She sighs. "I'm going to sound totally weird right now, but I forgot my keys in the common area and my roommate won't let me in." Her voice sounds hurt, and you actually feel bad for her.

"Yeah, okay," you say. You walk down to the common area. It's a room near the lobby, on the ground floor with a bunch of chairs, couches, and tables where students could study and socialize. You'd never been in it much.

"Where do you think you left it?" you ask.

"I dunno, just look around," she says. You look at all the tabletops and find the keys. Oddly, they're emitting a dull green light. At the touch, they feel cold. You turn around. "Found them," You say. "Thank you so much," she says, and grabs them. As she does it, you could swear you see somebody else in the corner of the room.

Little did you know it, but you and Eva are about to swap bodies! When does the swap occur?
1113211.title: Eva Samuels

11132112.content:
"Thanks." She says as you hand the keys over. For some reason you feel something happened, but you're not sure what.

"You're welcome." You tell the girl standing there a little uncomfortable. You're not sure what to say or to do. The best thing you can think of is to go back to your room. "I better get back to my room, I have some homework to do." You tell the girl.

"I need to go as well. Thanks again." The girl says looking happy as she looks at her keys. But before you can walk out of the common area, the girl suddenly says: "Um, my name is Eva. What's yours?"

"Jack. I guess I'll see you later then." You wave goodbye to the girl and quickly return home. As expected your parents are still not home, your mother has gone out with some of her new made friends and your father is working late. "Just as expected." You murmur as you make your way to your room. Not knowing what to do you decide to make your homework but after ten minutes you decide you aren't in the mood for it. You surf the web to kill some time, but in the end decide to go to bed.

Lying in your bed you just hope tomorrow will be a different day. You close your eyes and go to sleep not knowing your wish would come true. It's at one minute past midnight when you suddenly feel like you're being pulled by this invisible force. You try to move back but the tugging force keeps getting stronger and suddenly you feel yourself being lifted up in the sky. Not knowing any dream to begin like this you decide to open up your eyes. The next moment you see the wall of your room heading your way. You want to pull back, but the force still keeps tugging you. You close your eyes again and hope the impact doesn't kill you, but when you expect to hit the wall nothing happens. You open your eyes again and see to your surprise you're actually floating in the air.

"Wow." You let out as you can see you're flying above your neighborhood. What is this? Some kind of dream you're a ghost. But strangely enough you cannot control to where you're flying. It's like you're being drawn to something. In fact you notice from the way you're flying you're headed to the university. From all the places in the world you didn't want to go there (much more preferring the bedroom of some hot girl). When you're near the university you suddenly feel yourself changing course, now heading towards the girl's dormitory. But suddenly you're seeing something, something or someone is coming out of a window and heading your way. You want to look up, but your head is locked into this position. You fly through the window and into a room. You can see there are two people sleeping inside the room, each one sleeping inside a bed on the opposite sides of the room. Weird thing however is that you're drawn to one of these girls. Suddenly you get this bad feeling, like something from a horror script. You try to move away, but you seem to be stuck. It's only that when you're an inch away from the person, you can see it's a familiar looking girl. Who it is however, you can't say as you black out.

When you wake up the next morning you can hear an alarm clock going. You immediately reach for it and put it to snooze. Weird thing though is that you didn't set your alarm. You don't have any classes in the morning. Something feels wrong. You open your eyes and to your surprise you're not in your room anymore. This room looks unfamiliar to you, though there is a ring of familiarity to it.

You begin to lye up in your bed when you notice a weird sensation coming from your chest. Looking down you can see someone put a pair of balloons inside a unfamiliar black t-shirt. "What the." You let out. Your voice sounds different as well. Somehow this doesn't feel right. You notice a mirror hanging on one of the walls. You step outside of bed and ran over to it, or should you say stumble more likely. There is a weird pull of gravity you're feeling. Looking in the mirror you confirm your worst fear, as your reflection displays the shocked expression of Eva, the girl you met yesterday.

How do you react?
11132112.title: Overnight

"Gates family, welcome to your new home!" your mom exclaimed, happy as ever. You, of course, were miserable, having to go on a six hour drive to a new town, leaving behind your friends and the great life you had. You were at least happy to get out of the car, as your family had been driving you crazy!

Your mom, Linda, was a chubby, 45 year old woman who had singlehandedly raised her three children. She was a hard worker, and always kept her chin up, but was very stressed out. She was a plump woman with visible age on her face and body. She had hair that extended only barely past her face, and wore glasses.

Your 12 year old sister, Maddy, was a geeky girl who was obsessed with anime and nerdy stuff like Dungeons & Dragons. She had an unkempt mane of chestnut hair, a small, stocky build, and wore glasses. She was only 12, so her body was still developing.

Your 8 year old sister, Emma, was the definition of "girly". She was cute and hyper, always had a missing tooth or two, and was very thin. She had long brown hair and freckles.

Emma excitedly ran into the house before anybody else, and then shouted, "Mommy, what's this?" The rest of the family walked into the house to find out what she was talking about.

In the middle of the house, was a large machine with two pods. There was a note attached.

"Dear Gates family,

My name is Professor James Gardner, and I have spent years working on this invention of mine. You may find this hard to believe, but it is capable of swapping people's bodies. I have decided to leave it to you as I am old and have no use for it.

-Professor Gardner."

"Wow! Neato!" exclaimed your mom, "Hey, kids. Can I just say something crazy? I think that we should use this, and then destroy it! A new body to go along with our new house!"

"Yes yes yes!" exclaimed Emma, "I wanna be big!"

"That sounds interesting," said Maddy, "It reminds me of this manga I read..."

"Uh, no way! No offense, but I don't really want to be any of you guys." I said.

"Well, sorry, but we took a vote," mom said, and it's three to one. So, let's put our names in a cup and that's how we'll decide!"

I couldn't believe we were actually going through with this. But it was impossible to change my mom's mind. So soon enough, we were picking names.

"Jack, why don't you choose first?" suggested mom. Grimacing, I reached into the cup and pulled out a name. I looked at it to discover whose body I would live in for the rest of my life.

I felt how my body wanted to look away, but I managed to keep looking straight. I wasn't going to let an opportunity like this go to waste. I finally found someone who would actually believe me, someone I could trust.

Mrs. Meagle looked down as she seemed to think about something. "I know one thing for certain and that is that you're not Emma." I was relieved to hear that. "Emma would always look away when I gave her that look, and although I saw you were trying to avoid it you didn't do it."

"I'm relieved to hear that Mrs. Meagle." I said feeling more comfortable.

"Call me Emily, Jack, seeing as how you're are oops I mean were an adult." Mrs. Meagle said as she signed me to follow her.

"Thanks Mrs. M- I mean Emily."

Emily opened a closet and seemed to look for something. "Ah there it is."

"I'll be honest with you Jack, the work you made in class was way better than Emma ever did. So good even that if it would continue like this, you might skip a grade."

"I-I'm not sure if I would want that." I said nervous. If I would skip a grade I would lose the only chance to be with Emily.

"Look Jack, I know you're having doubts but look it from your perspective. You're a bright teenage boy trapped in the body of his little sister. Staying in this class would be a waste of your talents.

"But-but I wouldn't be able to see you again." I stuttered as I felt myself getting sad.

"That doesn't have to be, we can hang around with each other after school time, if you would want of course."

"I'd love it." I said excited.

"Great, but first you need to do this test." Emily handed me a couple of sheets. "It's one the third grade has to do, I want to know if you can do it too.

"Do I have to?" I asked her.

"You said you would do anything, didn't you?" Emily smiled.

"I guess so." I told her mumbling.

"Now you sit here, and try to do your best." Emily said as she walked away.

I sat there and looked the sheets over, these questions were not that difficult. I felt I had a choice. Or I could answer these questions truthfully and skip a grade. Or I could fail the test but not that much Emily would notice I did it intentionally.
112311121111.title: "Anything you said?"

choices: I passed to the fourth grade with ease.
The test was too hard for me.
1123111211111.content:
I didn't like the idea of moving away from Emily. In some way I already began to miss her, even though we just met. But the questions were so easy, my hand automatically began to write the right answer before I could think about it.

When I was finished I could see I had every answer right. I thought about changing some answers, as a perfect score would be suspicious. But before I could change it, Emily had sneaked behind me and grabbed the paper.

"Wow, this is amazing. You have every question right, Emily, I mean Jack."

"I know right." I said a bit proud.

"This is fantastic, I will inform the principal immediately. By the end of next week, you will be transferred to the third grade dear." Emily said grinning. I just smiled as she walked out of the class room. I didn't want to disappoint her, I only hoped this would turn out for the better.

Emily came true to her word. A week later I was transferred to Mr. Adam's class in the third grade. Mr. Adam was a nice man, he was always trying to make me do stuff better, but he couldn't beat Emily. He also saw that I was smarter than the rest of the kids. Just as Emily he made me take a test used in the fourth grade.

How did it turn out, you might ask?
1123111211111.title: Do your best on the test.

choices: go with them to the mall.
11231112111111.content:
Just like the test Emily gave me, I passed Mr. Adam's test with flying colors. It was weird, I thought when Mr. Adam had given me the results of the test and told me I would go to the next grade. I mean, I still was smart even though I was now in Emma's body and probably had her brains. When Emma was still in her old body she wasn't exactly a gifted child. She was just an average student just like me.

Mom (or Maddy) was really proud (or at least I thought) when I told her I was going to the next grade. Mom her looks had completely changed as to before the swap. She let her hair grow longer, she would wear different clothes and she would occasional buy manga or anime stuff.

Maddy wasn't the same either. She was more cheerful lately, she would experiment with different hair styles, dressing more like a teenage girl. Still, she was there for us, and would always listen to us whenever we needed someone to tell our stories to.

And then I haven't told about Emma's life. She was still the same hyper active girl as always. At school of course she had to act like me, but when she came home she would turn into her former behavior. I was still a little resentful at Emma for having my body and my life, but things were okay between us. She got along with the rest of my friends, even making a couple of new ones (all of them girls). But unlike me the swap didn't affect her brain. She still knew everything I knew, and in class she got the same grades I did. These things were weird.

When I got home again, I saw my mom and Maddy and in front of the car, waiting for me.

"Um where are you going?" I asked them.

"We're going to buy some new clothes, want to go with us?" Mom asked me.

"Um, I'm not sure." I said hesitant. Today I was wearing a pink t-shirt, with a skirt and a legging underneath. I didn't really know what else I would buy.

Come on Emma, this will be fun." Maddy said excited.

"You don't have to come, Jack will be staying home too." Mom said.

I decided to..
11231112111111.title: I passed to the fourth grade with ease.

choices: Emily wakes you up in your body
You wake up on your own
112311121111112.content:
"Nah, I'm gonna stay home. Plus I'm tired I need a nap." You said

You walk into the house and go into Emily's room, change into the pink pajamas you wore last night and layed down in her bed. Your eyes close and take a nap what happens when you wake up?
112311121111112.title: spend my time at home.

1123111211111121.content:
"Wakey, wakey." A low voice said to me. I feel someone tickling me, and I giggle uncontrollably as I squirmed in my bed. I open my eyes to see Emily standing in front of me. She was dressed in some shorts and a simple t-shirt.

"Why did you wake me? I was sleeping so nice." I grumble as I turn around.

"No, you can't do that. Then you can't sleep in the evening." Emily began tickling me again, so I had to stay awake.

"Fine. But no tickling anymore, alright?" I said showing a faint smile standing up from my bed. I begin to change myself, but to my embarrassment Emily doesn't seem to move.

"Um, can you get out?" I ask her nice.

"Why? It's nothing like I haven't seen before, you know." Emily replies.

"I know, it's just odd you looking at me like that." I tell her while pulling my shirt over my head.

"Is that why you've been avoiding me lately?" Emily asks serious. I pull on the legging and my skirt as I try to think of an answer. "Perhaps, yes. I mean, don't you find it odd to stare at your old body?"

Emily just shakes her head. "Not really, I think you're doing great. I'm proud of you."

"Really?" I ask surprised. Emily and me haven't talked a lot lately.

"Yeah, I mean, I would never guess you're that smart."

"Well, it's the only thing that I have left of myself."

"What do you mean? Do you miss your old body?"

I think how about I should put it. "Yes, Em, I do." The tears suddenly begin to drop. "I miss being myself, okay, I miss being a boy. I miss standing around to pee, I miss my old friends, I miss not being able to kiss a girl when I want it, and I miss being tall!" I let myself fall to the ground as the tears drop to the floor. I just wish this was some dream, where I could wake up. But no I'm stuck like this a lifetime, my whole miserable live.

Without saying a thing, Emily bows down towards me, grabs me, sits down on my bed and lets me cry on her shoulder. Emily just holds me and doesn't say a thing, she just lets me cry as I pour my heart out.

When I'm finished I look up at her, she's been crying too. "I also miss being myself Jack. I don't want to be a boy anymore. I just want to be an eight year old girl.

"We still have each other, right? Between the two of us we don't have to pretend to be someone else. I can be an eighteen year old boy and you can be an eight year old girl" I try to smile.

"Yeah, we can. I'm so happy Jack." Emily gives me a big bear hug.

"Em, you might want to let go, you're almost killing me."

"Sorry, I'm still not used to this body."

"That's okay, I'm glad it's you Em." I admit. "Wouldn't want mom or Maddy to have it. Can you imagine?"

"You mean mom looking like you telling us to do our homework, or Maddy who would lock herself in her room all day making you gain even more weight?" We both laugh at that. For the first time since we swapped I could laugh again.

"Thanks Em. I really need that." I tell her rubbing the tears of joy away.

"You're welcome, Jack. You know perhaps we should have a moment like this every day, just being able to be ourselves."

"I'd like that." I give her another hug and then she goes off to her room. I feel much better now, and I know that if something is bugging me, I can always talk to Emily now.
1123111211111121.title: Emily wakes you up in your body

choices: Let Maddy drive you to school.
11231112111111212.content:
BEEP BEEP BEEP. The alarm clock goes on like that until you hit the snooze button. The sound immediately stops as you open your eyes. You have to go to school today, not something you look forward to. You step out of your bed and make your way to the bathroom. Automatically your eyes are drawn to Emma's room, or better said her old room. Now it is the place where your mom makes her cosplay outfits.

You make your way into the bathroom as you look at yourself in the mirror. It's been four years now since you swapped with Emma. A lot has changed since that day. No longer were you the man in house and the oldest (except for your mom of course). Now you were a typical teenage girl. The reflection in the mirror confirms it.

Staring back at you is Emma's old body, or rather your body now. It's strange how familiar your body is to you now. Your big eyes and your big front row teeth and your short brown hair. Whenever you look at your hair, it makes you feel proud inside. Your mother begged and pleaded not to cut it. But thanks to Emily Maddy finally agreed to it. Thinking about Emma makes you feel a bit sad. Emily was a second year college student now. She had to move away. When you think about the day that Emily left you, you can almost feel the tears coming back to you. You never expected it to be that terrible, how you hugged Emily goodbye letting your hands go through her longer hair. But things are good for her now. She's doing great at college and she even has a boyfriend. At first it shocked you, the thought about your body making love with another man. But then Emma convinced you that this was for the better, she could never be herself with another girl (even though she's popular with the girls). In her mind she will always be a girl. The same counts for you. You're a twenty-two year old guy in the body of a girl. Your preferences have never changed of the years, it's just that you never felt a physical attraction.

You quickly shake your head. What are you thinking about? You have school to go to. You pull the tank top off, looking at your reflection with pride. While it took some time, your boobs are finally developing. They are not much to look at now, but in a few years they will grow bigger. You're sure of it! And then you hope you can finally indulge yourself in some exploration. Although you hope that it makes up for the disadvantages of growing into a woman. A few weeks ago you got to enjoy the first of your monthly pain. How sick you felt that day, never wanting to leave your bed. Hopefully it won't be as that bad in the future it. You pull of your panties and take a quick shower. After you're done you quickly leave the bedroom before your sister could walk in. Or your old mother Linda as she once was called. She looked nothing like her old body. Your mother changed your sister's identity completely. While at first she was weak and stocky, she now definitely had some assets to be proud of. Particular her tall legs and her big eyes which she uses to charm every boy she comes across. Not only the boys loved her, the camera loves her too. She could get selected to be a model if she keeps up her appearance. That is, if she doesn't get wasted at every party.

You walk inside your bedroom and quickly pull a training bra out of your wardrobe and some panties. It's summertime so you decide on a t-shirt with some skinny jeans. Nothing special. You walk downstairs where you find your mom standing. An even bigger change underwent your sister Maddy. While at first it seemed nothing special, soon Maddy found out why mom switched with her. The responsibilities at work, preparing food and the uncontrollable eating frenzy's. That soon changed with Maddy inside your mom. While at first Maddy seemed to break down, you and Emma talked a lot with Maddy. She missed her old life, but there was no way to change that. The only thing she could change were her circumstances. So she decided no more uncontrollable eating frenzy's. You could hear your sister as your mom wail in the beginning as she had such desires but she kept resisting it. Now she has a nice figure. Besides that Maddy now designs and makes her own cosplay costumes. What started as a joke from you, soon turned out to be daily thing. She even managed to sell some of her costumes. The downside was that you and your sister now had to model sometimes for your mom. The pro was that it earned you some extra pocket money.

Maddy was reading some documents for work. She already made your breakfast ready, an apple and a slice of bread.

"Hey Maddy." You say as you sit down. While your old mom would call you with your body's name you, Maddy and Emily still call yourself by your own name.

"Hey Jack. Good night sleep?" She asks while still reading through.

"Yeah, it was okay. How about you?" You ask interested.

"Not so good. I was still busy with adjusting costumes I lost track of time. I crept in my bed at half past one." Maddy said yawning.

"That's not good Maddy, you need your daily rest especially now."

"Yeah right, in case you haven't noticed I'm the oldest one around here." Ouch, since Maddy became your mother she was more talkative than before.

"I shouldn't have said that, I'm sorry Jack." Maddy said rubbing her temples.

"It's okay, I'm just worried about you Maddy. Doing your normal job and making these costumes takes a lot of energy. I just don't want to see you getting overworked."

"I know, I know but it's so much fun to do and besides the money isn't that bad either." Maddy grins.

"Maddy! You're not thinking about what I think you think?" You ask her.

"It's just so boring at the office, sure it's nicer than mom's older position but still." Maddy was frowning as she looked through the last few pages.

"We can talk about this later. I need to catch the bus." You say standing up and looking at the clock.

"Hey, I can also bring you with the car." Maddy suggests.
11231112111111212.title: A few years later.

112311121111112121.content:
"No, that's okay." You say with a look at the clock. "You just try to take it easy alright. And if something is bothering you, you can always talk about it with me or Emma."

"Um thanks Jack. I appreciate it." Maddy says a bit embarrassed. If she wouldn't look as your mom, you would almost say it was Maddy all over. It was the exact posture she usually would have. You get over to her quickly and give her a hug. "Nothing to worry, we're family. And I'll always be your big brother, no matter how I look." You say with a smile.

Your sister looks up and smiles a little too. "Not that I'm complaining yet, but aren't you going to miss your bus?" She asks with a curious smile.

You look up at the clock and see you only have a few more minutes. "Oh no. I'll have to go now. We'll talk later okay." You tell Maddy before you rush out the door and to the nearest bus stop. Sprinting as Emma still sucks in comparison to your old body but you manage to get there just as the busdriver wants to leave. Luckily he sees your charming smile and opens the door so you can get in.

"Next time try to be on time." The driver says looking straight forward.

"I know Ted, but thanks." You tell the driver as you make your way to the back. You come across a few of your classmates, but most of them ignore you. You're not really popular in your class, most people still don't understand how such a charming, talkative girl like you manage to keep up with them (not knowing you have done the same material already). You only have a couple of friends.

"Hey Em. Come sit next to us." Yuki says enthusiastic.

"Hey." Meg says in her monotone voice as she notices you. You make your way to the back of the bus and sit in between them.

Yuki and Meg are two of your friends. You know Yuki for two years and Meg for almost a year now. It's curious how the three of you seem to get along. Especially Yuki and Meg since they're the opposite of each other. Yuki has Japanese origins but has spend most of her life here. She's only an inch taller than you, has long black hair, a cute face and is fascinated with the color...pink. She's crazy about it, her entire room is pink and she preferably wears pink clothes. She also wants to dye her hair pink, but her parents have decided against it. She does have a pink wig in her room, but she isn't allowed to wear it outside. Nevertheless she remains a cheerful, preppy girl who can't wait until she can live on her own and paint her hair pink.

Meg on the other hand is the opposite of Yuki. Meg is more quieter, keeps most of the time to herself. She has long brown hair which she tries to use so nobody notices her. She's taller than you and how should you put it a bit big according to the other girls (after all considering your new height most people are bigger than you). You don't think it's true, she has a little meat on her but what gives? If you were still a guy you would find her more attractive than those other bamboo sticks in your class. Still, it does make her stand out and as a result she's mostly ignored by the other girls in class. If it weren't for you and Yuki she wouldn't talk with anyone.

"Ready for today?" You ask with the usual excitement.

"Sure." Yuki nods her head. Meg just nods her head as she looks outside the window. You make small talk with Yuki and try to talk with Meg. After a while the bus arrives at your school and you step outside with a spring in your step. You can't wait until class begins.
112311121111112121.title: Go with the schoolbus.

choices: Ask them both to do something fun.
1123111211111121211.content:
"So what did you girls take?" You ask Yuki and Meg as you sit down with them at the table in the cafeteria. "I have some salad, have to think about my waist." Yuki says holding out her tray. "Some spaghetti, I don't like veggies that much." Meg mumbles.

"That's nice, I took a salad too. Have to stay healthy." You say with a fake smile on your face. You hated salads when you were a boy, but since you were in Emma's body they didn't taste that bad. If only for the fact that the lunch lady even made a salad tasting worse, without doing something with it.

"You don't need to do that, you're as thin as a branch." Yuki comments.

"I know, but just the same I try to eat healthy." You say taking your first bite of the salad. To your surprise it is edible.

"You can eat it today?" Meg asks as she takes a bite of her spaghetti.

"Yeah, as long as you don't chew too long on it, it's good." You tell her taking another bite.

"So any plans this afternoon?" You ask the girls trying to get your mind off the food.

"I'm going shopping with my mom this afternoon." Yuki says excited.

"Nice, let me guess, something pink right?" You ask her grinning.

"How did you know?" Yuki giggled.

"And what about you Meg?" You ask her. She mumbles something about watching a movie at home.

"That's nice too." You tell her.

And your plans Em?" Yuki asks you.

"I don't know, nothing really planned out." Oh oh. You think as you just realized what you said. Both Yuki and Meg are looking at you expectantly. No way, I was planning to do some chilling at home. Now you are obligated to ask one of them to hang out with. But who do you ask?
1123111211111121211.title: During lunchbreak.

11231112111111212112.content:
You know that from the two Meg is the one being the loneliest. Even though Yuki hangs out with you and Meg most of the time she hangs out with the rest of the class as well. Meg on the other hand is more withdrawn and is being ignored by most. You think it will be best to spend some time with her.

"Can I hang with you Meg? I'm really in the mood for watching a movie." You ask Meg. For a second there she looks up to you and then mumbles that it's fine with her.

"Great, can't wait for it." You say with that patented smile of yours. Then the bell rings and it's time for class. During class you notice Meg's behavior. She seems more fidget, playing with her long brown hair, chewing her nails. She's lucky you're the only one who notices it.

When class is over you and Meg step on the bus and wave goodbye to Yuki who is being picked up by her mom. You and Meg sit in the back of the bus, nobody else is sitting next to you. While Meg is staring out the window you take a look at your phone.

Suddenly Meg pushes the stop button and a few seconds later the bus stops in front of the stop. You both walk out and head over to a nearby street. Meg then enters a small looking house with you following behind her. "Watch your step." She warns you and when you step inside the house you find it looks rather dirty. "Mom works day- and nightshifts so she doesn't have much time to do housework." Meg tells you as she notices your stares. She then enters a room.

"Wow, awesome!" You tell Meg. She has a collection of some video games posters on the wall that you like, couple of Cd's you used to listen to as well and she has a nice television set. Meg motions you to sit on the bed as the television is opposite from it. She then bends over to grab some DVDs. While being bend forward you notice Meg's underwear, a pink thong. You didn't know Meg wear these, but they sure suit her.

"Which one do you want to see?" Meg asks as she turns around and throws you two DVDs. You pick the...
11231112111111212112.title: Ask Meg, watching a movie.

112311121111112121122.content:
It's a thriller and not any one. It's one of your favorite b-movie's. You have seen it several times when you were your old self. You pick it out immediately and to your liking Meg tells you it's her favorite as well. You can't believe Meg likes this one as well. Not hesitating she quickly puts the DVD in and closes the curtains of her room. You know to make it even scarier. While watching the first part you and her both sit straight up looking at the screen. But somewhere in the middle of the movie you and Meg have begun lying down on Meg's bed, not only that you're holding her arm tightly. You don't even notice it you're doing. Meg does, but she doesn't mind. In fact she seems to enjoy it.

It's then that you knew somewhere now would be the scary moment, but having seen the movie so long ago, your memory is not so sure when. It's then that the killer suddenly shows up screen, holding a chainsaw. You're startled by it and scream pushing yourself against Meg. Meg moves the other side but since there was no more bed she fell off the bed. You fall on top of her.

"Sorry, I really was scared and...." You stare right into Meg's pretty face. You realize you haven't ever looked at Meg in this way. Her blushing cheeks, her piercing eyes, her long hair and that smell. She smells really good. Oh man, I really want to do her. You realize. You don't know where this came from, but some part in you wants to just kiss Meg straight on the mouth. The other part wants to back off, not knowing what you feel for Meg.

choices: The end of the school day
112311121112.content:
A few minutes later, I was sitting in Mrs. Meagle's office as she called my mother.

"She seems to think that she used to be her brother...mhm...mhm... well, in my professional opinion, I think she should see a therapist. The school can provide one...mhm... no, free of charge..." She rambled on for minutes, as I shrunk smaller and smaller into the comfy armchair that I was too small for. I dreaded having to see a therapist, because I wasn't even lying.

Finally, Mrs. Meagle hung up. "Your mother says you just have an overactive imagination, so I won't be putting you in therapy. However, every day at snacktime, I want you to come to my office so we can talk."

I nodded. It wouldn't be too bad, and could certainly be worse.

I walked back to the classroom, only to find it empty. It was lunchtime. I went to the cafeteria and sat down with some of the other girls in Emma's class. I couldn't bring myself to pay attention to what they were talking to, because even I required a certain level of intellectuality in my conversations. I found myself drifting off to daydreaming. I thought about my favorite Disney princesses, and... wait, what? I hadn't thought about Disney movies in years, however I knew Emma loved them. Was I becoming more like her, or was this all in my head? If I was becoming more like her, this whole thing would probably become more bearable. Being an eight year old girl is easier when you have the mind of one. However, I was also scared. I didn't want to lose who I really was, and if I was becoming more like Emma, did that mean I was becoming less like myself? The prospect of completely giving in and becoming my second grade sister in body and mind was alarming, to say the least.

I looked at my hands. They were so small, and my arms were squishy little twigs. I couldn't wait to get older, back to at least high school. I couldn't believe I would have to wait years until I could drive again. And the idea of going through elementary school and junior high again made me want to throw up. It was horrible the first time, but again? And as a girl? Hopefully I would grow up to be pretty, so I would at least be popular. That would make it easier for sure.
112311121112.title: " I think it's best if we called your mom, Emma."

1123111211122.content:
Looking back, I couldn't believe it'd been exactly four years since the swap. Life as Emma seemed more natural now, and although I really did miss my old body (who was now in college) I had two great best friends, Kayla and Alexis, and I was growing up to be a beautiful young woman.

I'd just recently had my first period, something I never thought I'd experience. I couldn't believe I'd have to put up with these for the rest of my life!

It was November, and I was enjoying sixth grade so far. I finally had a cell phone!

In the girl's bathroom, I looked at my reflection and thought back...

This body seemed so much more natural to me now. I had become more like Emma over the years, and whereas in my old body I was quiet and more reserved, as Emma I was an energetic, talkative, chatty (and slightly annoying) twelve year old girl. I had big eyes and big front teeth. My brown hair went down to about my shoulders. I had become quite a girly girl, but still remembered and wished for the days when I was a guy. I might be a twelve year old girl on the outside, but deep inside, there was a twenty one year old man.

"Hey," said my best friend Alexis as I walked out of the bathroom. "Hi," I said, and we hugged. Alexis was the first friend I'd made after the swap. She was my BFF, and was so pretty! She looked older than twelve, with a body that was already developing. She already wore real bras, not just training bras. A lot of girls were jealous of the way she looked. I had to admit that I was too. Kayla, my other BFF walked up. I met Kayla in fifth grade, bacause we were in the same class. The two of us had become inseperable. Kayla looked more like her age, just like I did. She had blonde hair that was a little shorter than mine, and was taller than most girls our age. She was very athletic. He smiled at me and walked next to me. We had first perio

"Thank you, kind sir! I've been trapped in this amulet for over 100 years! Now I shall take you body!"

"Wait, what?" you say.

"Don't worry, I'll give you a new body, kind sir!"

Before you know it, you are in the body of...

1131.content:
Darkness slowly fall upon on you, as you slowly lose all consciousness. You try to call for help with your last bit of energy, but it was fruitless as not even you captor could hear you inside this cursed object.
------
*Tap, Tap, Tap*
"Hey, wake up already! This may be an unfortunate day for you, but at least I the great "Wizard of Darkness" can provide you a consolation prize, and a fine one it is in my opinion"

You open your eyes to see that you are no more inside the house, but instead at the local park. Many questions loom inside your head, but as soon as they came did the answers also follow, as the next second a face very familiar was starring from a top, your own. Without hesitation your next action was to grab him, but a sudden change of gravity cause you trip, and fall to the ground. You try to stand up, but then you look down, and notice two huge molds of flesh stuck to your chest.

133.content:
"Dude, check out this new drink," said Mike, sliding up to me. His breath reeked of liquor and he was holding an ornate bottle with a pure blue liquid in it.

"What is it?" I asked.

"Some dude outside gave it to me," said Mike, "Said it's fire. Jack, you gotta try it, you haven't had anything all night. They say nobody's ever tried it before."

"If I have some can we leave?" I asked. Mike was my best friend, but he was always more of a risk-taker than me. He'd recently acquired some fake IDs for us and we were at a club. Mike had been trying to pick up girls all night, but I just wanted to go home.

He nodded drunkenly. I took the bottle and opened it, and glugged some of it down. It was surprisingly good, since I'd never really had any alcohol I liked. It made me feel weightless, and also gave me a weird tingling sensation that went through my body but then disappeared.

"Give it here," said Mike. He grabbed the bottle, but then dropped it and it shattered.

"Oh, shit!" Mike exclaimed, "Those guys told me not to use all of it... We're in some serious shit right now. Let's get out of here!"

We got out of the club and I drove Mike home. I then went home to a dark house. My family was asleep. I was surprised to find out it was almost 3 in the morning. I fell into bed and immediately fell asleep.

I woke up and got out of bed. And then I stayed hovering in the air.

"What the hell?" I said, but no sound came out. I could hear it, in my mind. Then I noticed my body was still sleeping in bed.

"So I guess you had the drink, then?" said a wispy female voice. I shouted and turned around to see a colorless girl also floating.

"Who are you?" I asked.

"My name is Annie," she said, "Welcome to the astral world."

"The *what* world?" I asked.

She sighed. "The astral world. It means you're, I guess what you would call a ghost, except your body isn't dead. Just asleep."

"How do I get back into my body?" I asked, examining my sleeping body and the girl.

"You can't," she said matter-of-factly. "You can, however, possess other people's bodies."

"So I can become someone else but not myself?"

"Yes," said Annie, "I'm just here to help you. I've been in the astral world for a few years now... my parents think I'm just in a coma. When you're astral, you can't talk to physicals."

"What if I possess someone?" I asked.

"Then you are become a physical. You can talk and interact with the physical world, but not with astrals. And you can die."

"Wow, this is insane," I said, trying to take in everything.

"I know, it's a lot to take in," said Annie, "But you can always possess somebody and live a normal life. Live any life."

Now THAT sounded pretty cool, I had to admit. Become someone rich or famous, live life as anybody else... I just had to find a place to start.

14311.content:
Elaine Woodley had been my next door neighbor for my whole life. She was my mom's best friend, and was well liked by almost everyone in town. A mother of three, Elaine was a 48 year old, slightly chubby woman with red hair, glasses, and freckles covering almost every inch of her body. She had three children, a seventeen year old girl named Elisa, and two nine hear old twin boys named Mikey and Chris. She also had a husband, Jeff. I never thought she would be anything but my next door neighbor and my mom's friend.

My name was Jack Gates. I was seventeen. We still don't know why this happened and we probably never will. All we know is it's permanent, and if there was some way to reverse it, we would know. Besides, I'd grown attached to the children who were now mine after all these years...

Let me start from the beginning. It was September, and I was just starting to get back into the groove of school. Elaine, or just Mrs. Woodley as I had called her back then, gave me a ride to school every morning with her daughter Elisa, who was my school friend. I had never really been anything more than cordial with Elaine, only a "Thanks for the ride, Mrs. Woodley," every morning.

School was just starting to become more like school. Tests, quizzes, and the likes were all piling up. I was walking into my house after a tough day.

"Howdy, Jack!" Mrs. Woodley called from over the fence. I waved back. And in that moment, it happened. All of a sudden, I was looking at myself standing on my front steps -who, in turn, was frozen looking at me.

"What the hell just happened?" I asked out loud. Then I realized what had happened- I had just spoken in Mrs. Woodley's voice.

"Jack..." said my body, "Are you in there?"

15523221.content:
It was drawing day, and I was worried. This was the first year the school was doing this, and if I got picked, I just didn't know what I would do. Luckily, there were about two hundred students in the school, so it wasn't like I had the odds stacked against me; but then again, someone had to be picked, right?

The school had recently opted to partake in an experiment being conducted by the government, in exchange for an expanded budget. The experiment was a test for a beta body-swapping invention of some kind, and they wanted to see the long-term effects of a body swap on two different adolescents. When the school first decided to enact this experiment, they asked for two volunteers. However, when nobody stepped forward, they decided they would draw two names randomly, one boy and one girl, and they would be the ones testing the invention. The biggest problem was that the effects of the invention lasted for two years. So if I got swapped, I would end up in someone else's body for two years.

The experiment was anonymous, and it was very important that the subjects didn't tell anybody. Only a select few people in the government would know who was involved in the swap.

It was a Monday. During my lunch period, I checked my phone and had a text from an unknown number.

Dear Mr. Gates,

Best wishes.

1552322212431.content:
Biology class had started off pretty normal, me and my buddy Danny horsing around while the endlessly boring Mr Johnston droned on about ‘dangerous substances’ or something, you know the usual same-old boring chemistry bull crap.

I’d somehow stuffed two thermometers up in my mouth when the principal decided to walk in, interrupting my class’s practical while doing so. For some strange reason that I can’t really comprehend, Principal Gonzalez didn’t understand the comedic genius of my hilarious walrus impression and dragged me out of the class to talk with me.

“Listen to me, Mr Gates,” Dr Gonzalez hissed, “I’ve got half a mind to call up your Mom and tell her what you’ve been up to. The only reason I’m refraining from doing so is frankly because I don’t want to waste my air complaining to her, yet again, about your behaviour. Understand?”

I nodded my head sarcastically, a move that had proved efficient with many adults I’d encountered over my 16 years on planet Earth. Principal Gonzalez definitely seemed satisfied, a smug grin plastered on her face as she thought she’d reformed one of her ‘troubled students’. I rolled my eyes and strolled back into the classroom, bumping fists with Danny as I rejoined him at our desk.

“Mr Gates, I’m not finished speaking with you yet!” called Principal Gonzalez as she stomped her way back into the room. Now, if she hadn’t come over and grabbed my arm, none of what I’m about to tell you would’ve happened and I wouldn’t be talking to you right now. Anyways, she grabbed me and I immediately jerked my hand back in response, accidentally pushing over a trio of unmarked test tubes and sending them crashing to the floor.

The room was immediately flooded by a thick pink smog that surrounded everything and made my eyes water. Worse still, I could feel something shifting inside me, as if my very essence was being sucked out and absorbed into the swirling cloud. The last thing I remember seeing was Principal Gonzalez’s shocked face before I rushed towards her and blacked out.

“Hello? Hello?” I could hear voices calling out to me but they were strange, muffled as if I was underwater. I groaned as I regained consciousness, opening my eyes to see Mr Johnston and a bunch of other kids staring down at me. “Thank God, you’re awake! How are you feeling?” Mr Johnston asked.

“I’m good, just a little dizzy...” I groggily levered myself upwards as the other children stepped back. I shook my head, pushing a few strands of light brown hair from my face as I half-listened to Mr Johnston speaking. Did Mr Johnston get taller? I asked myself as I now had to look up to him instead of looking him in the eyes. I nodded as he continued to mumble on, feigning interest.

“...ipal Gonzalez?” I cursed as Mr Johnston now stared at me, probably catching me out for zoning out. “Yeah! Yeah, what you just said, yep, completely true!” I smiled at him, this action for whatever reason seeming to unnerve him even more. “Relax, dude, it’s just me, J...”

I stopped abruptly when I looked into the reflection of one of the beakers set on the table in front of me. Instead of seeing my slightly scrawny, developing male body, I saw a Latino woman in her early 40s. Her body was still in great shape, 5'6" with large D cup breasts and a svelte body with sexy, feminine curves. I was completely dumbfounded as I stared at the woman in the reflection. I waved a hand and was shocked to see the woman completely mirror me. I’m... I’M FREAKING PRINCIPAL GONZALEZ!

By this moment I think Old Johnston definitely thought his boss was going crazy from the pink smoke she’d inhaled. “Principal Gonzalez, I repeat, are you alright?”

I spun round, nearly smacking another set of test tubes with my massive new jugs. I awkwardly rested one of my new, feminine arms on the corner of Mr Johnston’s desk. I scoffed, maybe a bit too loud, as I tried to cover myself. “Alright? Yep! Doing just peachy! Nothing strange here! I’m Principal Gonzalez! Definitely not a 16 year old boy! Pfft, what?” Now everyone in the room stared.

“I mean, get back to work students! Soak your heads in the... learning waters of, erm, education or something. If anyone needs me, don’t, I’m going to the bathroom and I... I need to take a dump! Yeah, and if I don’t go now, I’ll crap ALL OVER my panties. Okay? Erm, safe learning or whatever.” I slowly backed out of the room slowly, turning around and running down the hallway leaving the poor class dumbstruck.

A hallway monitor was quietly patrolling the corridor when he saw me zip past. “Hey, you need to slow down... PRINCIPAL GONZALEZ?” He watched as my female form ducked into one of the boy’s bathrooms. The dude probably reasoned, Well, I guess it IS her school.

As soon as I ducked into one of the stalls I threw off the strappy heeled sandals that I’d foolishly ran down the corridor with. How the hell do women DEAL with these death traps! I tried to compose myself, something that was hard to do considering that I was a horny 16-year-old kid in a sexy, 40-something-year-old body. Eventually I calmed down enough to think, deciding to:

info.brief_description: A collection of many body swap stories
info.description:
Okay, so this will be a compilation of the many body swap story ideas I've had. While there will be multiple stories, some rules will apply to all stories.

In every story, your name is Jack Gates. You are somewhere between 16-18 years old.

You DO NOT have to and SHOULD NOT use the same characters for Jack's family in every story.

You DO NOT have to write in the second person for each story; but, if a story is using first person narration, don't randomly switch to second person narration.

DO NOT change character's names in the middle of a story.

Other than that, feel free to add whatever you want. I am hoping this can become a big interactive.
